author: The Hindu Net Desk
title: Morning digest: Home Ministry extends visa of stranded foreigners till May 3, Indore registers eight deaths in a day, and more
description: A select list of stories to read before you start your day
content:
Indore registers eight deaths in a day
Indore on Thursday registered eight deaths in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic and 256 new cases, the most for the city in a day.
